list.text: AppBe comes with simple Notifications component that allows you to show some useful messages to user and request basic actions.

component.data: Be.page("notifications",function(){var oPage=$(this);var notiFull = {icon: '',title: 'AppBe',titleRightText: 'now',subtitle: 'This is a subtitle',text: 'This is a simple notification message',closeTimeout: 3000};var notiWithButton = {icon: '',title: 'AppBe',subtitle: 'Notification with close button',text: 'Click (x) button to close me',closeButton: true};var notiCallbackOnClose = {icon: '',title: 'AppBe',titleRightText: 'now',subtitle: 'Notification with close on click',text: 'Click me to close',closeButton: true,onClick: function () {Be.app.alert('Notification closed');}};oPage.on('click','.open-full', function (e) { Be.app.notification(notiFull); });oPage.on('click','.open-with-button', function (e) { Be.app.notification(notiWithButton); });oPage.on('click','.open-callback-on-close', function () { Be.app.notification(notiCallbackOnClose); });});
